data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Another World Heroine Generator 2 for MZ
data.detailed_description:
Get ready to update your heroines’ appearances with Another World Heroine Generator 2 for MZ! This time offering up 42 new female generator parts to help you create the heroine of your dreams.

Give your shy heroine bangs that cover one of her eyes, or use the slightly shaggy bangs to show that your character is too busy to waste time brushing her hair. With 20 clothing options to choose from, outfitting your heroines has never been easier!

And once you’ve picked your heroines’ outfits, make sure to give them one of this pack’s 5 accessories to finish their look! Along with all these generator parts, this pack also includes an adjusted female base to make sure the off-the-shoulder clothing options look the best they can. Bring your heroines to life with Another World Heroine Generator 2 for MZ!

Features:

* Clothes ("fantasy" style) = 20
* Accessories x5, tail x1, beast ears x1 set
* Eyes = 5 sets
* Front Hair = 5 Female
* Rear Hair = 5 Female
* Compatible with RPG Maker MZ


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
